text:
Introduction
Imaginez personnaliser vos CV et lettres de motivation pour chaque candidature sans effort manuel. Gr√¢ce √† Google Apps Script, vous pouvez automatiser ce processus et √©conomiser du temps.

title: Automatisation de CV avec Google Drive
text:
Qu‚Äôest-ce que Google Apps Script ?
Google Apps Script est une plateforme de script int√©gr√©e √† Google, permettant des automatisations comme :
- Personnalisation de documents
- Conversion en PDF
- Envoi d‚Äôemails automatis√©

title: Automatisation de CV avec Google Drive
Introduction √† l‚ÄôImpression 3D
text:
Technologies et mat√©riaux principaux

Technologie courante
La plus utilis√©e est la mod√©lisation par d√©p√¥t fondu (FDM), o√π un filament de plastique est chauff√© et extrud√© pour former les couches de l‚Äôobjet.


Mat√©riau le plus utilis√© : PLA
Le PLA (acide polylactique) est √©conomique, facile √† utiliser et moins toxique que d‚Äôautres mat√©riaux. Cependant, il pr√©sente des limitations :

Non adapt√© pour un contact constant avec des aliments.

Non recommand√© dans des environnements humides ou chauds.

title: Bienvenue √† SheInventor!
text: SheInventor est n√©e dans le but de briser les barri√®res de genre dans la technologie, en combinant l‚Äôart, la science et l‚Äôinnovation pour former les femmes aux comp√©tences n√©cessaires pour les emplois de demain. Depuis mon enfance, mon objectif a √©t√© d‚Äôutiliser mes comp√©tences en design et en enseignement pour aider les gens √† comprendre le monde qui nous entoure. Ce projet est ma contribution √† la cr√©ation d‚Äôun espace inclusif et d‚Äôacc√®s au savoir pour tous, ind√©pendamment des st√©r√©otypes ou des limitations auxquels nous faisons face.

title: Introducci√≥n a la Impresi√≥n 3D
text:
Desempaquetado y Ensamblaje

Verifica el contenido

Revisa que est√©n todas las partes: marco, base, extrusor, cables y herramientas.

Ensambla el marco vertical y f√≠jalo a la base.

Instala el extrusor Titan y conecta todos los cables correctamente.

Nivelar la cama

Precalienta el extrusor (200¬∞C) y la cama (60¬∞C).

Usa un papel para ajustar la distancia entre la boquilla y la cama. Aseg√∫rate de sentir una ligera resistencia en cada esquina y en el centro.

title: Introducci√≥n a la Impresi√≥n 3D
text:
Carga del Filamento

Precalienta la boquilla a 200¬∞C.

Corta la punta del filamento en un √°ngulo e ins√©rtalo en el extrusor.

Usa la opci√≥n ‚ÄúCargar Filamento‚Äù en el men√∫.

Aseg√∫rate de que el filamento fluya correctamente por la boquilla.

title: Introducci√≥n a la Impresi√≥n 3D
text:
Preparar el Modelo para Imprimir

Obt√©n un modelo 3D

Descarga desde plataformas como Thingiverse en formato STL.


Corta el modelo

Usa un programa como Cura.

Configuraci√≥n para PLA:

Temperatura del extrusor: 200-210¬∞C

Temperatura de la cama: 60¬∞C

Relleno: 20% (est√°ndar).



Guarda el G-code

Exporta el archivo a una tarjeta microSD.

title: Introducci√≥n a la Impresi√≥n 3D
text:
Imprimir

Inserta la tarjeta microSD en la impresora.

Selecciona el archivo desde el men√∫.

Monitorea las primeras capas para garantizar una buena adhesi√≥n.

Espera a que termine la impresi√≥n.

title: Introducci√≥n a la Impresi√≥n 3D
text:
Retirar y Mantener

Deja enfriar la cama antes de retirar la impresi√≥n.

Guarda el filamento PLA en un contenedor seco y herm√©tico con gel de s√≠lice.

Limpia regularmente la boquilla y la cama.

title: Introducci√≥n a la Impresi√≥n 3D
text:
Soluci√≥n de Problemas

Cama desnivelada: Reajusta la nivelaci√≥n.

Mala adhesi√≥n: Ajusta la configuraci√≥n de la primera capa o usa adhesivo en la cama.

Atascos de filamento: Limpia la boquilla o recarga el filamento.

title: Getting Started with 3D Printing
text:
Unboxing and Assembly

Verify the contents

Check for all necessary parts: frame, base, extruder, cables, and tools.

Assemble the vertical frame and secure it to the base.

Install the Titan extruder and connect all cables firmly.

title: Getting Started with 3D Printing
text:
2. Level the bed

Preheat the extruder (200¬∞C) and the bed (60¬∞C).

Use a piece of paper to adjust the distance between the nozzle and bed. Ensure slight resistance at each corner and the center.

title: Getting Started with 3D Printing
text:
Loading Filament

Preheat the nozzle to 200¬∞C.

Cut the filament tip at an angle and insert it into the extruder.

Use the ‚ÄúLoad Filament‚Äù option on the menu.

Ensure the filament extrudes properly from the nozzle.

title: Getting Started with 3D Printing
text:
Preparing the Model for Printing

Get a 3D model

Download from platforms like Thingiverse in STL format.

title: Getting Started with 3D Printing
text:
Slice the model

Use software like Cura.

Choose settings for PLA:

Extruder Temp: 200-210¬∞C

Bed Temp: 60¬∞C

Infill: 20% (standard).
##


Save the G-code

Export the file to a microSD card.

title: Getting Started with 3D Printing
text:
Printing

Insert the microSD card into the printer.

Select the file from the menu.

Monitor the first few layers to ensure proper adhesion.

Wait for the print to finish.

title: Getting Started with 3D Printing
text:
Removing and Maintaining

Let the bed cool before removing the print.

Store PLA filament in a dry, airtight container with silica gel.

Regularly clean the nozzle and bed.

title: Getting Started with 3D Printing
text:
Troubleshooting

Uneven bed: Re-level the bed.

Poor adhesion: Adjust the first-layer settings or use an adhesive on the bed.

Filament jams: Clean the nozzle or reload the filament.

title: Facing My Fears on Ice
text:
A long time ago, I had a serious fall while ice skating that left me injured and shaken. The fear of getting back on the ice was overwhelming, but I found the courage and strength to return.
I didn‚Äôt do it alone. I was supported by loving and caring people who encouraged me every step of the way. Their presence made all the difference and helped me regain my confidence.
Watch this video to see my journey back to ice skating!



Watch the video

title: Facing My Fears on Ice
text:
A long time ago, I had a serious fall while ice skating that left me injured and shaken. The fear of getting back on the ice was overwhelming, but I found the courage and strength to return.
I didn‚Äôt do it alone. I was supported by loving and caring people who encouraged me every step of the way. Their presence made all the difference and helped me regain my confidence.
Watch this video to see my journey back to ice skating!



Watch the video

Welcome to my website! Here, you will find resources on various topics, including comics and tutorials.


Our mission is to make science accessible to everyone by using visual and interactive resources.



For any questions or suggestions, feel free to contact us at: info@monsite.com.

title: Welcome to SheInventor!
text: SheInventor was created with the goal of breaking gender barriers in technology, combining art, science, and innovation to equip women with the skills needed for future jobs. Since childhood, my objective has been to use my design and teaching skills to help people understand the world around us. This project is my contribution to creating an inclusive space with access to knowledge for everyone, regardless of the stereotypes or limitations we face.

title: Welcome to SheInventor!
text:
Contact
üìß Email: contact@sheinventor.com
üåê Social Media:
Instagram | YouTube

title: Introduction to 3D Printing
text:
Main Technologies and Materials

Common Technology
The most used is Fused Deposition Modeling (FDM), where a plastic filament is heated and extruded to form the object‚Äôs layers.


Most Common Material: PLA
PLA (Polylactic Acid) is affordable, easy to use, and less toxic than other materials. However, it has limitations:

Not suitable for constant food contact.

Not recommended for humid or hot environments.

title: Automating CVs with Google Drive
text:
Introduction
Imagine personalizing your CVs and cover letters for every job application without manual effort. With Google Apps Script, you can automate this process and save time.

title: Automating CVs with Google Drive
text:
What is Google Apps Script?
Google Apps Script is an integrated scripting platform in Google, enabling automations such as:
- Document personalization
- PDF conversion
- Automated email sending

title: Automating CVs with Google Drive
text:
Requirements for this Tutorial

Google Docs: A cover letter template

Google Sheets: A database of companies and specific information

Google Drive: A folder to store the generated PDF files

text:
Tecnolog√≠as y materiales principales

Tecnolog√≠as comunes
La m√°s usada es la modelaci√≥n por deposici√≥n fundida (FDM), en la que un filamento de pl√°stico se calienta y extruye para formar las capas del objeto.


Material m√°s utilizado: PLA
El PLA (√°cido polil√°ctico) es econ√≥mico, f√°cil de usar y menos t√≥xico que otros. Aunque tiene limitaciones:

No adecuado para contacto constante con alimentos.

title: Introduction √† l‚Äôimpression 3D
